title: Miscellanea di poesie del secolo XVIII
additional_titles: La dulcinea trionfante [unfinished pastoral romance in prose], f. 1r|Miscellaneous poetry [religious verse, odes, epigrams, etc.] by several authors, f. 12v|Serenata a? quattro: soprano, soprano, contralto, tenore [libretti for serenades, dramatic dialogues], f. 53r|Miscellaneous poetry including satirical sonnets regarding the betrothal of Sig.
